profile:
Replacement Windows and Doors

At Nickel City Renovators we only use top quality replacement windows and doors. We realize that you not only want top quality products but also need top quality workmanship for the windows and doors to perform at the level they are designed for.

We pride ourselves for being focused on customer service and workmanship for all our clients. Properly installed windows and doors can save you up to 20% in energy savings. If you are giving your home more curb appeal for resale, new windows and doors have proven to increase selling prices by up to 10%. Changing your windows and doors benefits your wallet with energy savings and reduces your impact on the environment by helping to reduce greenhouse gas. 
Why Nickel City Renovators?

We have been in the window and door business for over 15 years.We are not a jack of all trades, we are specialist in this field. This is what we do. With that experience we know that a replacement window or door is only as good as its installation.

Business owner Gerry is a "hands on" kind of guy and is personally at every job site with his crew. From the initial in-home consultation and throughout the entire project, Gerry will be with you every step of the way, including the final inspection of your new windows and doors. 

We also have an extensive background in window and door inspection and repair, so we can confidently tell you what needs to be repaired to make your home more efficient.

We typically work within and 1.5 hr driving radius of Sudbury, Ontario, but we have been know to venture out farther to satisfy our clients needs, so please feel free to call us to discuss your replacement window and door needs. Gerry will be glad to meet with you and give you a free estimate.

Specializing In Energy Efficient Products.

We install Casement (Crank) Windows, Awning Windows, Single and Double Hung Windows, Bay Windows, Bow Windows, Single and Double Slider Windows, Picture Windows and Custom Windows.

Also available: Vinyl Patio Doors, Steel Entrance Doors, Garden Doors, Fiberglass Entrance Doors and Storm Doors.

We also install Quality Vinyl Siding Products.

Nickel City Renovators is a proud installer of Ross Windows and Doors as well as other quality manufacturer's products.

 Now Call 705 - 662 - 9646 For A Free Consultation and Estimate. Or Visit us at:

http://nickelcityrenovators.knackthat.com

We are a registered business in Ontario, With active liability and WSIB Insurances.
Check us out in the Yellow Pages under Windows & Doors.
